resources.string: Click the button to deliberately crash the app. Note how this will send a log to the UI.

Welcome to the EboLogger demo! If you had the UI desktop app running before you started this demo, it should have connected and brought up a new window. In either case, you can see all messages in the adb logcat.
Because we installed the activity tracker in the Application\'s onCreate, switching to a new activity will automatically create log events.
